<!ELEMENT CREATE_BIS EMPTY > <!ATTLIST CREATE_BIS BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST CREATE_BIS PLAUSI CDATA "NNNN" > <!ATTLIST CREATE_BIS SEPPL CDATA "EIW" > <!ATTLIST CREATE_BIS WERT CDATA "" >
<!ELEMENT CREATE_VON EMPTY > <!ATTLIST CREATE_VON BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST CREATE_VON PLAUSI CDATA "NNNN" > <!ATTLIST CREATE_VON SEPPL CDATA "EIW" > <!ATTLIST CREATE_VON WERT CDATA "" >
<!ELEMENT Content ( PARAMETER ) >
<!ELEMENT MANDANTEN EMPTY > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN PLAUSI CDATA "01,02,20,21,54" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN SEPPL CDATA "EIWP" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN WERT CDATA "01,02,20,21,54" >
<!ELEMENT PARAMETER ( UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST, MANDANTEN, AB_VTR_NR, BIS_VTR_NR, CREATE_VON, CREATE_BIS, PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA, PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA, RUN_VERARBSTATUS ) >
<!ELEMENT PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA EMPTY > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA PLAUSI CDATA "INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA SEPPL CDATA "EIWP" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA WERT CDATA "INFO" >
<!ELEMENT PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA EMPTY > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA PLAUSI CDATA "OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA SEPPL CDATA "EIWP" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA WERT CDATA "OK" >
<!ELEMENT RUN_VERARBSTATUS EMPTY > <!ATTLIST RUN_VERARBSTATUS BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_VERARBSTATUS PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_VERARBSTATUS SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST RUN_VERARBSTATUS WERT CDATA "null" >
<!ELEMENT UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST EMPTY > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "UC4 Deployment Test" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST PLAUSI CDATA "JN" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST SEPPL CDATA "WIE" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST WERT CDATA "N" >
]> <Content> <PARAMETER> <UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG="UC4 Deployment Test" PLAUSI="JN" SEPPL="WIE" WERT="N"/> <MANDANTEN BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="01,02,20,21,54" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="01,02,20,21,54"/> <AB_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIW" WERT=""/> <BIS_VTR_NR BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIW" WERT=""/> <CREATE_VON BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIW" WERT=""/> <CREATE_BIS BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="NNNN" SEPPL="EIW" WERT=""/> <PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="OK"/> <PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="INFO"/> <RUN_VERARBSTATUS BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="J/N" SEPPL="EI" WERT="N"/> </PARAMETER> </Content>

row.process:
!BBS Standart-Include zum setzen von Variablen für aufgerufene Jobs :INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02,20,21,54',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &CREATE_VON#,,"CREATE_VON [NNNN]",'',K :READ &CREATE_BIS#,,"CREATE_BIS [NNNN]",'',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'OK',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'INFO',K :READ &RUN_VERARBSTATUS#,,"RUN_VERARBSTATUS [J/N]",'N',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &CREATE_VON# = &CREATE_VON# :PSET &CREATE_BIS# = &CREATE_BIS# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# :PSET &RUN_VERARBSTATUS# = &RUN_VERARBSTATUS# !**************End of GeneratedText**************
